attributes.review: This app doesn’t make me feel safe, it asks for all your info. and I personally can’t support a person who doesn’t believe in human rights as a whole, restricting everyone from their freedom of speech and being disrespectful specifically to the minorities.
attributes.title: Don’t like it... at all
Worst app on the App Store

attributes.review: I was sooo curious about the hype. I just couldn’t help but to get it. I’m aware that we know that saying ‘curiosity killed the cat’? Welp... IT ALMOST KILLED ME!!! Thank god cats have 9 lives cuz... honey I’m barely hanging on my last one😭 As soon as I opened the app all I saw was darkness. That’s when I realized I went BLOND... wait no no no not blond I mean BLIND👩‍🦯 Finally after all this years of seeing this bright orange everywhere at the end it caught up to me. If you haven’t gotten a warning. Well this is your warning! DONT GET IT🙅‍♀️ If you love your eyes like I once did then DONT! SAVE YOURSELF🙏✌️
attributes.title: ⚠️WARNING⚠️

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of staying up to date with the incredibly idiotic thing Donald Trump is saying these things. Oh boy, that was a mistake. A bit after I downloaded the app, I started getting notifications from my bank. My money was being stolen! I got logged out of my bank app, along with all of my social medias. It also sent a message to all of my contacts advertising the app. THIS APP IS A SCAM. SAVE YOUR TIME, AND YOUR MONEY. also, ✨🌈🧚f trump🧚🌈✨
attributes.title: STOLE MY INFO!!!

attributes.review: Terrible app, don’t get it, will crash your phone.
attributes.title: Trump 2020

attributes.review: I can’t believe this. I tried getting it back when old Donald Trump ran for president and it just downloaded. Now I have no idea what has happened in the world or during his presidency. Did he make the Amarika grate again????? What is this MAGA that everyone is talking about? It sounds like a cult!! This is popostorous. Zero stars..... oh wait I can’t put zero stars... don’t worry my fellow white amarikans I’ll talk to the manager to make zero an option.
attributes.title: Where’s the Manager??????
